data.actual_result: The next entry / the user below the original one is highlighted, the same as pressing tab.
data.expected_result: The previous entry / the user higher than the original one is highlighted.
data.short_description: Shift tab does the same thing as tab, it advances to the next entry instead of previous, in DM invite box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open DM invite box. - Move around your mouse to make sure someone is highlighted. - Press tab a few times to move downwards. - Press shift+tab a few times.
